title: Update contact information with new mobile number, email, and address

requirements.summary: Ensure the ContactSection component displays the updated contact information from the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section displays the new mobile number '+91 788 796 3508'
Contact section displays the new email 'sccclasses@gmail.com'
Contact section displays the new address 'Old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)'

file_operations.description: Verify that the ContactSection component correctly fetches and displays the updated contact information from the backend getContactInfo function. Ensure the component renders the new phone number '+91 788 796 3508', email 'sccclasses@gmail.com', and address 'Old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)' returned by the backend. Maintain the existing component structure, styling, and contact form submission functionality as specified in the constraints.
